annotations.description: How to make the best Espresso Martini, with or without an actual espresso machine! The Espresso Martini is to my mind something of an oddity. Even though it'...
annotations.title: Espresso Martini made Two Ways! | How to Drink

textContent:
Dick Bradsell's Espresso Martini
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Simple Syurp
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. Coffee Liqueur
2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Vodka

Double shot of Espresso
Shake & Strain
Garnish with Coffee Beans

Jeff Morgenthaler Version
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Cold Brew Concentrate
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Kahl√∫a
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Vodka (100 proof)

Twist Lemon into Shaker
Shake & Strain
Garnish with Coffee Beans

---

1 oz Espresso Coffee
.5 oz Coffee Liquor
.25 oz Simple Syrup
2 oz Vodka

Shake with ice
